TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ComEventsHelper extends System.Object
public ref class ComEventsHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: Proporciona métodos que permiten agregar y quitar de objetos COM delegados de .NET Framework que administran eventos.

span.span: Provides methods that enable .NET Framework delegates that handle events to be added and removed from COM objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Combine (object rcw, Guid iid, int dispid, Delegate d);
.method public static hidebysig void Combine(object rcw, valuetype System.Guid iid, int32 dispid, class System.Delegate d) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Combine (rcw As Object, iid As Guid, dispid As Integer, d As Delegate)
public: static void Combine(System::Object ^ rcw, Guid iid, int dispid, Delegate ^ d);

param.name: rcw
param.span: Objeto COM que desencadena los eventos al que al llamador le gustaría responder.

span.span: The COM object that triggers the events the caller would like to respond to.

param.name: iid
param.span: Identificador de la interfaz de origen utilizado por el objeto COM para desencadenar eventos.

span.span: The identifier of the source interface used by the COM object to trigger events.

param.name: dispid
param.span: Identificador de envío del método en la interfaz de origen.

span.span: The dispatch identifier of the method on the source interface.

param.name: d
param.span: Delegado al que se va a invocar cuando se active el evento COM.

span.span: The delegate to invoke when the COM event is fired.

summary.span: Agrega un delegado a la lista de invocación de eventos que se originan en un objeto COM.

span.span: Adds a delegate to the invocation list of events originating from a COM object.

permission.span: requiere plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: Un código de confianza parcial no puede utilizar este miembro.

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

param.name: rcw
param.span: Objeto COM al que está adjunto el delegado.

span.span: The COM object the delegate is attached to.

param.name: iid
param.span: Identificador de la interfaz de origen utilizado por el objeto COM para desencadenar eventos.

span.span: The identifier of the source interface used by the COM object to trigger events.

param.span: Identificador de envío del método en la interfaz de origen.

span.span: The dispatch identifier of the method on the source interface.

param.name: d
param.span: Delegado que se va a quitar de la lista de invocación.

span.span: The delegate to remove from the invocation list.

summary.span: Quita un delegado de la lista de invocación de eventos que se originan en un objeto COM.

span.span: Removes a delegate from the invocation list of events originating from a COM object.

returns.span: Delegado que se quitó de la lista de invocación.

span.span: The delegate that was removed from the invocation list.
